    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_478be2c03feb386794389642cc68c4a1ef2535be</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Failed experiment on measuring speed of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verlassenes Experiment auf messender 
Lichtgeschwindigkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérience échouée sur la vitesse de la 
lumière de mesure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência falhada na velocidade de luz de 
medição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento guastato su velocità di luce di 
misurazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποτυχημένο πείραμα στη μέτρηση της ταχύτητας του 
φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimento fallado en la velocidad que mide de 
la luz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This cartoon shows Galileo Galilei's experiment to measure the speed of light by timing how long it takes for light to travel from two persons that are miles apart did not work. This is because light travels very fast.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">galileo galilei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Karikatur stellt dar, daß Galileo Galileis
das Experiment, zum zu messen der Lichtgeschwindigkeit durch die 
zeitliche Regelung, wie lang sie für Licht zum Spielraum von zwei 
Personen nimmt, die Meilen auseinander sind, nicht arbeitete. 
Dieses ist, weil Licht sehr schnell reist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce dessin animé montre qu'expérience Galilée 
pour mesurer la vitesse de la lumière en chronométrant combien de 
temps elle prend pour la lumière au voyage de deux personnes qui sont
des milles à part n'a pas travaillé. C'est parce que la 
lumière voyage très rapidement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este cartoon mostra que experiência de galileo 
galilei para medir a velocidade de luz cronometrando quanto tempo faz 
exame para a luz ao curso de duas pessoas que são milhas distante 
não trabalhou. Isto é porque a luz viaja muito rapidamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo fumetto mostra che esperimento del galileo
galilei per misurare la velocità di luce cronometrando quanto tempo 
prende per luce alla corsa da due persone che sono miglia a parte non 
ha funzionato. Ciò è perché la luce viaggia molto 
velocemente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα κινούμενα σχέδια εμφανίζουν το πείραμα ότι 
Γαλιλαίου Galilei για να μετρήσει την ταχύτητα του φωτός από 
το συγχρονισμό πόσο καιρό πολύ παίρνουν για το φως στο ταξίδι 
από δύο άτομα που είναι μίλια χώρια δεν ελειτούργησε. 
Αυτό είναι επειδή ελαφριά ταξίδια πολύ γρήγορα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta historieta muestra que experimento de 
galileo galilei para medir la velocidad de la luz midiendo el tiempo 
de cuánto tiempo toma para la luz al recorrido a partir de dos 
personas que sean millas aparte no trabajó. Esto es porque 
viaja la luz muy rápidamente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galileo Galilei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Galilée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vitesse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">galileo galilei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">velocidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">galileo galilei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">velocità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">galilei Γαλιλαίου</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ταχύτητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">galileo galilei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">velocidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
